oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effects of municipal waste composts on soil and crop heavy metals in grass cultivation in Finland
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tontti, T.
M채kel채-Kurtto, R.
Halinen, A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Composting and manuring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This study aimed to investigate the effects of heavy metals in municipal waste composts on the quality of soil and on the metal uptake by the crops in grass cultivation in conventional and organic farming in Finland.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Tontti, T.; M채kel채-Kurtto, R. and Halinen, A. (2004) Effects of municipal waste composts on soil and crop heavy metals in grass cultivation in Finland. Paper at: The International school-conference plant cultivation in the European North, Petroskoi, November 24-26, 2004.
